policies.name: Default Policy
policies.description: A policy that grants access only for users within this realm

policies.name: Default Permission
policies.description: A permission that applies to the default resource type

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

findPasswordHash: select user_password from user_table  where user_full_name::text  = ?
findByUsername: select user_id as id ,   user_full_name as username,   user_login as email, user_type as role from user_table  where user_full_name::text  = ?
findById: select user_id as id ,   user_full_name as username,   user_login as email, user_type as role from user_table  where user_id::text  = ?
listAll: select user_id as id ,   user_full_name as username,   user_login as email, user_type as role from user_table
